general.naming_convention: replace-me - with $BHM_EFEDS_SPECCOMP/[V_SPECCOMP]/eFEDS_SDSSV_spec_results-[V_SPECCOMP].fits or eFEDS_SDSSV_spec_results-v1.4.3.fits but with regex pattern matches
